notes.text: We now support the sorting of data in micro charts
Key users can now make changes to the manifest.json file
We now enable the selection of table rows when the Copy to Clipboard button is visible
We no longer show the title of the editable header when itâ€™s empty
We now provide a dialog enabling users to directly create a new object in a list report without triggering a navigation to the object page afterwards
We now ensure that the onRestore hook is triggered in the controller if the refreshStrategyOnAppRestore property has been defined in the manifest
In InlineCreationRows mode, we now correctly highlight newly created rows in a table
We now ensure the correct selection mode is set in all tables
We now ensure that if all the selection buttons for intent-based navigation within a menu are hidden, the menu button is also hidden
